name: wired-paywall
title: WIRED Paywall
subtitle: Make the readers pay for it
synopsis:
I was the lead product enginner at WIRED for the site's paywall project across the entire stack. This product had to integrate a third party tracking service, [Evolok](https://www.evolok.com/), with client side user data.

Much of the business logic happened at our Fastly edge server which I became intimiately familiar with. Since WIRED gets millions of visits, ensuring the entire project scaled and cached correctly was a difficult but inspiring challenge.
